tool_description: Verifies migration script compatibility across different database versions and identifies version-specific issues.

migration_sql.description: Migration script to check for compatibility

target_versions.description: List of database versions to check compatibility against

error_messages: Empty migration script: Provide valid SQL migration content.
Unsupported database type: Specify a supported database system.
Invalid version format: Database versions must be in proper format (e.g., 13.2, 8.0.25).
Compatibility check failed: Unable to complete compatibility analysis.
usage: Provide migration_sql, database_type, and target_versions array to check compatibility across different database versions.

overall_compatible.description: Whether migration is compatible with all target versions

compatible_versions.description: List of versions where migration is fully compatible

incompatible_versions.description: List of versions with compatibility issues

version_specific_issues.description: Detailed list of version-specific compatibility problems
